hotels.title: Fiji Family Fun on Mana Island with All-Inclusive Dining, Nightly Drinks & FJ$300 Resort Credit
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate beachfront playground at Mana Island Resort & Spa, an idyllic tropical sanctuary in Fiji’s breathtaking Mamanuca Islands. Surrounded by turquoise waters, coral reefs and white sandy beaches, Mana Island offers the quintessential, fun-filled tropical island escape. Spend days blissed out on a beach lounger with a book and cocktail in hand. Set off kayaking on crystal-clear waters or snorkel past neon-bright marine life directly from the beach. With all-inclusive dining, Mana’s onsite restaurants and bars offer tantalising local and international cuisine, featuring themed dinners and a swim-up pool bar. Every meal promises to delight and keep your tropical vibes going strong. After days of island adventures, unwind at the Mana Spa with a soothing massage or pedicure. For parents wanting a moment of peace, drop the little ones off at the Kids' Club and relax poolside at one of the two sparkling swimming pools, soaking in the tranquillity and tropical beauty all around.
